algorithm_technique: Sort one array in ascending order and the other in descending order, then compute the product sum.
problem_summary_simple: Rearrange one array to minimize the sum of products of corresponding elements.
problem_summary_technical: Sort nums1 ascending and nums2 descending, then calculate the dot product.
key_insights: To minimize the product sum, pair the smallest elements of one array with the largest elements of the other.
Sorting both arrays (one ascending, one descending) is the key to achieving this pairing.
This is a classic rearrangement inequality application.
